domains_configuration_renew_step1_questi: To renew your domains, you will need to use the OVH renewal interface (outside of the Web Control Panel).
domains_configuration_renew_step1_unable: You are not the billing contact, so you cannot renew some of the domains selected ({{t0}}).
These domains will not be included for renewal.
domains_configuration_renew_step1_no_sel: You have not selected any domains to renew, or you are not authorised to renew any.
domains_configuration_renew_step1_confir: Click the "Order" button to open a new window and renew your domain names.
domains_configuration_renew_step1_inform: A new tab will open, and you will automatically be redirected to the OVH renewal interface.
domains_configuration_renew_step1_alert: Please note that after your payment has been accepted, it will take approximately 2 hours for the renewal to appear in the Web Control Panel.
domains_configuration_dnssec_batch_step1: You haven't selected any domains to configure, or DNSSEC cannot be modified for the selected domains.
Please enable or disable DNSSEC for the selected domains
Enable DNSSEC on the selected domains
Disable DNSSEC on the selected domains
domains_configuration_dnssec_batch_step2: Do you really want the following modification to be applied to the selected domains?
domains_configuration_dnssec_batch_succe: Your DNSSEC modification request has been registered.
domains_configuration_dnssec_batch_parti: Your DNSSEC modification request was registered for some domains, but errors occurred for others.
domains_configuration_dnssec_batch_fail: The error occurred on requesting the DNSSEC modification.
domains_configuration_dnssec_batch_step1:
The DNSSEC protocol secures DNS exchanges via asymmetric and public-key cryptography. DNS responses are authenticated using a pair of keys, a public one which verifies the validity of a signature, and a private one to create the signature linked to the domain name's DNS zone.

As a result, a hacker looking to poison a DNS server would find their attempt foiled by the resolvers, as it would be alerted by the invalid or absent signature linked to the DNS zone.

However, this is not always the case, as few DNS resolvers from ISPs currently verify the validity of responses signed by DNSSEC, so the DNS often still works without these authentication mechanisms.

Your DNSSEC modification request has been registered.

domains_configuration_dnssec_simple_acti: Are you sure you want to enable DNSSEC for the {{t0}} domain?
Your DNSSEC modification request has been processed.
The error occurred on requesting the DNSSEC modification.
